mapper.select: SELECT a.tano, a.tanm, a.tatype, a.detailflag, a.sharetype, a.inserttimestamp, a.updatetimestamp, a. sendflag, a.send, a.receive, a.dssend, a.dsreceive, a.currencyreceive, a.oneacctflag, a.senddetail, a.settlmode, a.recvmipst, a.recvcfile FROM tainfo a INNER JOIN fundinfo b ON a.tano = b.tano WHERE b.fundid = #{fundId}
